expo.name: Simple Map Demo

infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses location to show your position on the map and for navigation features.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app uses location to show your position on the map and for navigation features.

expo.description: Demo app for OSM SDK. To test native map features, use EAS Build with the 'preview' profile to create an APK for real device testing. Expo Go does not support custom native modules.
